LanguageData.DryadicOrgan.label: dryadic organ
LanguageData.DryadicOrgan.description: A large and weird mass seemingly sculpted by hand.
LanguageData.DryadicHeart.label: dryadic heart
LanguageData.DryadicHeart.description: A heart sculpted by hand. Something stirs within it.
LanguageData.DryadicLung.label: dryadic Lung
LanguageData.DryadicLung.description: A lung artisticly sculpted by hand. Air flows through it.
LanguageData.DryadicLiver.label: dryadic liver
LanguageData.DryadicLiver.description: A liver artisticly sculpted by hand. Blood filters through it.
LanguageData.DryadicKidney.label: dryadic kidney
LanguageData.DryadicKidney.description: A kidney artisticly sculpted by hand. Waste filters through it.
LanguageData.DryadicEye.label: dryadic Eye
LanguageData.DryadicEye.description: A beautiful eye, far to beautiful. Leaves a uncanny valley feeling.
LanguageData.DryadicNose.label: dryadic nose
LanguageData.DryadicNose.description: A perfect nose, it's just so perfect.
LanguageData.DryadicEar.label: dryadic ear
LanguageData.DryadicHand.label: dryadic hand
LanguageData.DryadicHand.description: A Beautiful hand, but one can swear it shifts when no one is paying attention.
LanguageData.DryadicHand.comps.0.tools.0.label: branch
LanguageData.DryadicFoot.label: dryadic foot
LanguageData.DryadicFoot.description: A beautiful foot, it craves to feel the earth undearneath it.
LanguageData.DryadLeg.label: dryadic leg
LanguageData.DryadLeg.description: The perfect leg, craves to feel the sun.
LanguageData.DryadArm.label: dryad arm
LanguageData.DryadArm.description: The perfect arm, craves to feel the sun.
LanguageData.DryadArm.comps.0.tools.0.label: branch
LanguageData.DryadSeedImplant.label: embedded seed
LanguageData.DryadSeedClusterImplant.label: embedded cluster
